meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Authorize an alcohol permit to Lee Ann Yarbor
agenda_items.description: To serve alcohol at the USA Women’s Half Marathon to be held at T. P. Hill, located at 3240 West Lawther Road on September 21, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Authorize an alcohol permit to Juan Contreras
agenda_items.description: To serve alcohol at the Texas Latino Pride event to be held at Reverchon Park on September 14, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Authorize acquisition from Revolver Investment
agenda_items.description: Of approximately 9,000 square feet of improved land located at 902 South Waverly Drive for development of a future park.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the placement of a dedication plaque
agenda_items.description: At the Paul D. Dyer Administration Building and Service Center located at 10031 East Northwest Highway.

agenda_items.title: Authorize an art installation on park property
Authorize a public hearing on Chapter 12 City Youth Program Standards of Care
agenda_items.description: To receive public comments on readopting and continuing in Chapter 12, 'City Youth Program Standards of Care.'

agenda_items.title: Authorize a two-year Interlocal Agreement
agenda_items.description: With Dallas Independent School District to provide after school programs and conduct summer camp programs.
